prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an elegant celestial being, tall stature, pale light-blue skin tone, impossibly tall vertical white hair structure, serene intelligent eyes, wearing a regal maroon silk garment, gold neck ring
feature_prompt: hyperrealistic texture on the silk fabric, delicate subsurface scattering on the pale skin, detailed structure of the white hair
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, humanoid proportions, flat lighting, low quality
